channel.title: Scala on Sem Sinchenko
channel.description: Recent content in Scala on Sem Sinchenko

item.title: Supporting multiple Apache Spark versions with Maven
item.description: I had a chance to work recently on an open source project that implements a custom Apache Spark datasource and related logic for working with Graphs data. The code was written to work with Apache Spark 3.2.2. I committed to extend the support to multiple versions of Spark. In this blog-post I would like to show how the structure of such a project it may be organized with Maven Profiles
